MAN.TITLE: AND applied to binary representation of inputs arguments
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: AND applied to binary representation of inputs arguments

DESCRIPTION.P: Given x and y two positives integers, this function returns z the decimal number whose the binary form is the AND of the binary representations of x and y. (x, y, z have the same size. If dimension of x (and y) is superior than 1 then z(i) is equal to bitand(x(i),y(i))
